description: Test suite for Nvidia tool integration in an agent-based system, verifying tool invocation, streaming responses, asynchronous behavior, and multiple tool calls within the system.

methods.name: test_tool_use
methods.description: Tests basic tool invocation and response content for a specific agent configuration.

methods.name: test_tool_use_stream
methods.description: Tests streaming response and detection of tool calls during streaming.

methods.name: test_async_tool_use
methods.description: Asynchronous test for tool invocation and response content.

methods.name: test_async_tool_use_stream
methods.description: Asynchronous streaming test for tool calls detection.

methods.name: test_parallel_tool_calls
methods.description: Tests multiple tool calls in a single agent run for multiple entities.

methods.name: test_multiple_tool_calls
methods.description: Tests multiple different tools invoked in a single run, verifying content.

methods.name: test_tool_call_custom_tool_no_parameters
methods.description: Tests custom tool function with no parameters invoked by the agent.

methods.name: test_tool_call_custom_tool_optional_parameters
methods.description: Tests custom tool function with optional parameters.

methods.name: test_tool_call_list_parameters
methods.description: Tests tools handling multiple URLs and content extraction.
